name: GUUL
description:
Sometimes a ghost wants to be let out of the underworld to wreak a little havoc. Unfortunately, the Reaper and his minions aren't as empathetic.

Control the ghost with WASD or arrow keys . You're constantly losing health, so try to stay alive by spooking helpless villagers and by drinking powerful potions. Try to get the longest time possible.

If you're ever confused, visit the about section in the menu.

This game was a 3-week(ish) long challenge made with the Halloween spirit!
